H0.text: In which year was the 'Boxing Day Tsunami' in the Indian Ocean. 1999

H1.text: In which year was the 'Boxing Day Tsunami' in the Indian Ocean. 2000

H2.text: In which year was the 'Boxing Day Tsunami' in the Indian Ocean. 2001

H3.text: In which year was the 'Boxing Day Tsunami' in the Indian Ocean. 2004

A4.text: On 26 December 2004, the earthquake caused a massive tsunami known as the Boxing Day Tsunami.
